quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.

quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

quotes.author: Babe Ruth
quotes.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.

quotes.author: Aristotle
quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.

quotes.author: C.S. Lewis
quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.

quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller
quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

quotes.author: Dr. Seuss
quotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.

quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.

quotes.author: George Eliot
quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey
quotes.quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.

quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
quotes.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison
quotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

quotes.author: Pablo Picasso
quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.

quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw
quotes.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau
quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.

quotes.author: James Cameron
quotes.quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.

quotes.author: John Lennon
quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

quotes.author: Yoda
quotes.quote: Do or do not. There is no try.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky
quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.

quotes.author: Tony Robbins
quotes.quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.

quotes.author: Stephen King
quotes.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.

quotes.author: Lou Holtz
quotes.quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.

quotes.author: Ayn Rand
quotes.quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.

quotes.author: John Wooden
quotes.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.

quotes.author: David Brinkley
quotes.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.

quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.

quotes.author: Les Brown
quotes.quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.

quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
quotes.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.

quotes.author: Lao Tzu
quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.

quotes.author: Amelia Earhart
quotes.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.

quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson
quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale
quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
